property.name: spark.yarn.executor.memoryOverhead
property.description: The amount of off heap memory (in megabytes) to be allocated per executor. This is memory that accounts for things like VM overheads, interned strings, other native overheads, etc.

property.name: spark.yarn.driver.memoryOverhead
property.description: The amount of off heap memory (in megabytes) to be allocated per driver. This is memory that accounts for things like VM overheads, interned strings, other native overheads, etc.

property.name: spark.yarn.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
property.description: The interval in ms in which the Spark application master heartbeats into the YARN ResourceManager.

property.name: spark.yarn.max.executor.failures
property.description: The maximum number of executor failures before failing the application.

property.name: spark.yarn.queue
property.description: The name of the YARN queue to which the application is submitted.

property.name: spark.yarn.containerLauncherMaxThreads
property.description: The maximum number of threads to use in the application master for launching executor containers.

property.name: spark.yarn.submit.file.replication
property.description: HDFS replication level for the files uploaded into HDFS for the application. These include things like the Spark jar, the app jar, and any distributed cache files/archives.

property.name: spark.yarn.preserve.staging.files
property.description: Set to true to preserve the staged files (Spark jar, app jar, distributed cache files) at the end of the job rather then delete them.

property.name: spark.yarn.max.executor.failures
property.description: The maximum number of executor failures before failing the application.
